segments.text: Does your child still believe in Santa Claus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . She believes everything about him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . If she doesn't believe it , Christmas won't be so exciting to her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When are you going to tell her that Santa Claus doesn't exist ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not going to tell her . She will find out and understand when she grows older .
segments.speaker: S2
